name: Secret Mission Escape Room
storyline:
In the city, some dreadful disorder has spread all over the city. It's time to show your skills and move through the different locations solve the mystery puzzle and escape from the zombies. There are many difficulties and scary objects to reduce your potential for survival from the place. Your main goal is to find a way to escape from the rooms of zombies.

Enjoy immersive gameplay and engaging storylines as you investigate murder cases, interact with intriguing characters. You’ll visit unique locations and examine troubling murder scenes, collect clues and look for any evidence in the murder.

Adventure through the dark secret missions to find all the items hidden in the room that will allow you to survive when the door opens. Each of them stimulate your thinking power and tests your concentration skills; you want to think out of the box to exit the doorway.

You'll never be stuck since every puzzle has plenty of hints including the full solution. You are locked in a room and have to figure out clues, complete tasks, and find the key to escape…

Finally, use your logical skill and thinking abilities to solve the numerous puzzles and find a way to the end of all the zombies, giving peace and happiness to the city. A mission should be achieved before running out of lives.
summary: Secret Mission Escape Room is a new collection of an interesting room escape challenges. Explore the hidden riddling puzzles and travel towards a different kind of location with two engaging storylines, to save the city and investigate the murder case. Plan your secret mission and find hidden objects to escape from one level to another. Challenge yourself and explore different kinds of hidden riddling puzzles in a point-and-click adventure mode of gameplay.
